subdialogue_text: Name thyself, stranger.
I am Yorshka. Captain of the Darkmoon Knights.
What beckoned thee to such a place?

If thou'st come stumbling here in error,
I bid thee leave anon.

This tower is a prison.
Thy presence shall invoke the ire of the tyrant, Sulyvahn.

Though 'twas a rare delight to converse with another.
My thanks, strange visitor.
May the Darkmoon watch over thee.
Thou think'st to remain?

This tower is a prison.
Thy presence shall invoke the ire of the tyrant, Sulyvahn.
I bid thee leave, anon.
May the Darkmoon watch over thee.

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Thou think'st to-

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Very well. Captain to this knightless company, I remain.

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: I will grant thee purpose.

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Thou'st journeyed far; hear my voice.

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: If thou shalt swear by the Covenant, to become

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: A shadow of Father Gwyn and Sister Gwynevere,

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: A blade that shall hunt the foes of our Lords;

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text:
Then I place thee under the aegis,
and the power, of the Darkmoon.

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Thou'rt now a Blade of the Darkmoon.

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: The only knight of our company.

behavior: #0Choose "Perform Darkmoon Loyalty" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Swear this oath, and face thy solemn duty.

behavior: #0Kneel-After joining the Blade of the Darkmoon Covenant
subdialogue_text: Oh, good Blade of the Darkmoon, welcome home.

behavior: #0Kneel-After joining the Blade of the Darkmoon Covenant
subdialogue_text: If I can provide thee succour, only tell me how.

Long ago, our father Gwyn,
lamenting the waning of the fire, became cinder of his own will.

Now, the fire is linked by the champions
who have come in his stead.

Such is the will of father, and the gods.
And so the Darkmoon knights took arms,
to watch over those who link the fire.
But long ago, our company lost its last proper knight.

Only its covenant was preserved, to this day,
until the time of thy visit.
Heirdom taketh many forms, indeed.
May I pose thee a question?

This tower, this prison, stands tall and solitary,
the contraption bridging its lower reaches long unmoving.
So...by what path didst thou here ascend?
Art thou a creature of the air, or other winged thing?

behavior: #0Choose "No, I can't fly" to the 3rd query
subdialogue_text: No, of course not.

behavior: #0Choose "No, I can't fly" to the 3rd query
subdialogue_text: Forgive my prying. Think no more on mine asking.

behavior: #0Choose "No, I can't fly" to the 3rd query
subdialogue_text: I am ashamed to say, I know very little, of anything...

behavior: #0Choose "Yes, I can fly" to the 3rd query
subdialogue_text: Oh, my! I imagined it might be so.

behavior: #0Choose "Yes, I can fly" to the 3rd query
subdialogue_text: Then thou'rt a dragon, or perhaps a crow?

behavior: #0Choose "Yes, I can fly" to the 3rd query
subdialogue_text:
Well, whatever thou beest, thou'rt wondrous strange,
yet strangely familiar, visitor.

behavior: #0Choose "Yes, I can fly" to the 3rd query

subdialogue_text:
The Darkmoon Knights were once led by my elder brother,
the Dark Sun Gwyndolin.

But he was stricken by illness,
and leadership of the knights fell to me.

Then Sulyvahn wrongfully proclaimed himself Pontiff,
and took me prisoner.
Oh where could my dear brother be?
If only he were here, I would be most pleased for ye both to meet.
As, most assuredly, would he.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 1
subdialogue_text: My Blade of the Darkmoon, thy deeds merit great worship.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 1
subdialogue_text:
As Captain,
'tis my duty to honour knights of great accomplishment.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 1
subdialogue_text: Please, it is thine, and not lightly given.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 1
subdialogue_text:
As a shade of Father Gwyn
and Sister Gwynevere,

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 1
subdialogue_text:
Persevere in thy knightly duty,
hunting down the gods' would-be foes.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 2
subdialogue_text: My Blade of the Darkmoon, thy deeds merit great worship.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 2
subdialogue_text: I, Yorshka, captain of this company, hereby recognise thy service.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 2
subdialogue_text:
This is a wonder of the Darkmoon,
inherited from my brother for this very purpose.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 2
subdialogue_text: Please, take this. Thou'rt most deserving of it.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 2
subdialogue_text:
As a shade of Father Gwyn
and Sister Gwynevere,

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 2
subdialogue_text:
Persevere in thy knightly duty,
hunting down the gods' would-be foes.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 2
subdialogue_text:
...I would speak to my brother of this, one day.
Of the shining new hope that joined our dear company.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 2
subdialogue_text: I speak of thee, of course.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after deeping Blades of Darkmoon to rank 2

subdialogue_text: Off so soon?
May the Darkmoon watch over thee.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-1st time, after joining the Blade of the Darkmoon
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time, after joining the Blade of the Darkmoon
#0Upon being attacked-3rd time, after joining the Blade of the Darkmoon
subdialogue_text: Please, stop this!

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-4th time, after joining the Blade of the Darkmoon
subdialogue_text: Thou'rt no true knight!
Dear brother, forgive me...
##Thou art return'd?

##This tower is a prison.
Thy presence shall invoke the ire of the tyrant, Sulyvahn.
##I bid thee leave, anon.
##May the Darkmoon watch over thee.
##Oh, this is...my brother's...finger.
##How it has thinned and withered...

##Oh, my thanks.
I'm certain thou'st given my brother peace.
##It is not much, but take this ring.
##It is not much, but please take this.

##As my thanks, not as a captain,
but as sister to the Dark Sun Gwyndolin.
##...Thou'st granted me my brother's touch, one last time...
##There is no one left...
##Dear brother, forgive me...
##I have been deceived...
##This man is a grave threat...
##This woman is a grave threat...
